verbs.description: [ARG1: arrest] [V: follows] [ARG2: serious clifton park crash] state police on friday arrested a clifton park man after his pickup truck collided with a minivan causing serious injuries to those in the van brandon m iacovissi 27 of clifton park was arrested for vehicular assault in the first degree and felony dwai- drugs based on a previous conviction for the same charge in 2017 according to police brandon m iacovissi clifton park town court state police clifton park new york albany medical center hospital
